description: Ingress is a collection of rules that allow inbound connections to reach the endpoints defined by a backend. An Ingress can be configured to give services externally-reachable urls, load balance traffic, terminate SSL, offer name based virtual hosting etc.

status.description: Status is the current state of the Ingress. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status

spec.description: Spec is the desired state of the Ingress. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status
